roleset.name: subject to penalty for offense

roles.note: Arg 3 does not exist in verb roleset. This argument seems to be more core to the noun.

example.name: Args 0, 1
example.text: Do some authorities adjust their punishment of minorities for fear of being labelled a racist?

example.name: Args 0-2
example.text: ...the cruelty of their punishment of the Shudra for studying the Veda

example.name: With Arg 3
example.text: ....their punishment of death for rejecting God.

roleset.note: Roleset based on WordNet eventive noun senses. Corresponds to verb entry punish.01, with VN class 33. FrameNet Rewards_and_punishments. Framed by Claire.
